name: Danball Senki Baku Boost
summary: Danball Senki Baku BOOST (ダンボール戦機 爆ブースト), localized as LBX: Little Battlers eXperience, is a Nintendo 3DS game for the Danball Senki game franchise. As of now, it is currently the only game in the franchise to get localized outside of Japan. The game is an improved remake version of the original Danball Senki game, with even more features continuing from Danball Senki BOOST.
